title: 411: Hannah Berner!
itunes:title: 411: Hannah Berner!
description:
The Broads are joined by comedian Hannah Berner! They chat Bekah’s recent scandal, how Hannah knows Bekah previously, her time on reality tv and what followed, “having it all”, TikTok, her wedding, answer some relationship questions, and much more! 

 

HANNAH BERNER:

Follow Hannah on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hannahberner/ 

Tikok: https://www.tiktok.com/@hannah_berner 

Listen to “Giggly Squad”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/giggly-squad/id1536352412 

Listen to “Berning in Hell”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/berning-in-hell/id1442257788 

Check out her tour dates: https://www.hannahberner.com/shows 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY130 and use code CHATTY130 to get $130 off, plus free shipping!

***STIR DATING APP: Download Stir or tell your single parent friends to try it out!
***FAVOR: Go to HEYFAVOR.COM/CHATTY and Favor is offering a $10 donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a regular patient!

***BLENDERS EYEWEAR: To score 15% off your Blenders purchase, visit BLENDERSEYEWEAR.COM and enter promo code CHATTYVIP

***CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50 

***STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial, plus free postage and a digital scale at  STAMPS.COM with code CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
